FuncDef:
The black-hole-dup-mac command configures flapping MAC routes as black-hole routes.
The undo black-hole-dup-mac command restores the default configuration. The black-hole-dup-mac command configures flapping MAC routes as black-hole routes. The undo black-hole-dup-mac command restores the default configuration. By default, flapping MAC routes are not configured as blackhole routes. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.
